Desc.entry: Part of Methodist Pilgrim Circuit and the Sheffield Inner City Ecumenical Mission. Meet for Christian worship, fellowship and hosts regular community activities.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Sunday Service at 10.30am, Tues & Wed 11.30am-1.30pm (over 50s lunch club), Fri 11.30am-1.30pm (Afro Carribean lunch club), Sun 12.30-2pm (Shona speaking congregation), please contact as times subject to change
